Two users unwittingly shared a prime when generating RSA keys. Recover the message from the captured ciphertext: 887881804464198208900848490150602078671832672476345777266960611459867158911780775091808188138670029234033061346449755006197532896799433333427714432539025830092747652620523274416177803496533299716379516882984395093812081332775888628.

The flag format is flag{...}
n=1118011157548551026354371157750444161112437126113954278440362574614812718393429479550537146132719629200364752450913938040012492358523960663089631156865829152555381079869856231238987067321898409962519887684384559860804371534337621613, n2=1150967436588010037031580504105373671486619242011413918608596930469873414516186236125475829494098484660081959357221639422923708875662343195552471140624464421232835025086131366154226629060036030705651931018267310010229957737789629759, e=964092867977845289436023548091791116034414736263372023291620821765294845481438786045313123729853676146112206193147756970719778191153514381164600515976101799795263150341499440055920417999121523563000624548977541444967857856179104757

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{5p903vpd}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 887881804464198208900848490150602078671832672476345777266960611459867158911780775091808188138670029234033061346449755006197532896799433333427714432539025830092747652620523274416177803496533299716379516882984395093812081332775888628
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=1118011157548551026354371157750444161112437126113954278440362574614812718393429479550537146132719629200364752450913938040012492358523960663089631156865829152555381079869856231238987067321898409962519887684384559860804371534337621613, n2=1150967436588010037031580504105373671486619242011413918608596930469873414516186236125475829494098484660081959357221639422923708875662343195552471140624464421232835025086131366154226629060036030705651931018267310010229957737789629759, e=964092867977845289436023548091791116034414736263372023291620821765294845481438786045313123729853676146112206193147756970719778191153514381164600515976101799795263150341499440055920417999121523563000624548977541444967857856179104757
